trans-unit.source: Represents selectable child items of container controls that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa os itens filhos selecionáveis de controles de contêiner que suportam <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem implementar esse padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o elemento atual para a coleção de itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to add a selection to a single-selection container where <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.CanSelectMultipleProperty"></xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and another element is already selected.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de adicionar uma seleção em um contêiner de seleção única onde <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.CanSelectMultipleProperty"> </xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> e outro elemento já está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores de propriedade em cache para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade, obtenha a propriedade usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade em cache.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os valores da propriedade atual para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de propriedade atuais.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento gerado quando um item é adicionado a uma coleção de itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
trans-unit.target: Se o resultado de uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A>chamada é um único item selecionado, então um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent>será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento gerado quando um item é removido de uma coleção de itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
trans-unit.target: Se o resultado de uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A>chamada é um único item selecionado, então um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent>será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a call to any of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Select*>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection*>, or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection*> results in a single item being selected.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento que é gerado quando uma chamada para qualquer um dos <> </> *>, <> </> *>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection*>resulta em um único item sendo selecionado.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.IsSelected*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.IsSelected*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: Remove o elemento atual da coleção de itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to remove a selection from a selection container where one item is selected and <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.IsSelectionRequiredProperty"></xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de remover uma seleção de um contêiner de seleção em que um item é selecionado e <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.IsSelectionRequiredProperty"> </xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.
trans-unit.target: Desmarca todos os itens selecionados e, em seguida, seleciona o elemento atual.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
